Title: Relates to requiring certain court of appeals judges to recuse themselves from serving as a juror during an impeachment trial of a governor that appointed them
Summary: Requires court of appeals judges to recuse themselves from serving as a juror during an impeachment trial of a governor that appointed them.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the judiciary law, in relation to requiring certain court of appeals judges to recuse themselves from serving as a juror during an impeachment trial of a governor that appointed them
